document_data.name: Fizmorayen Fitzmoran
document_data.mainbody:
}
'''Fizmorayen Fitzmoran''' was an exiled high [[artificer]] and a [[cleric]] of [[Gond]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. He lived in the fortress known as [[Throne Rock]], protected by several [[glyph of warding|''glyphs of warding'']], on the island of [[Tuern]].
document_data.Possessions: Fitzmorayen kept several tons of valuable ore within his castle.
document_data.Relationships: Living with Fizmorayen within his sanctuary were several [[dwarves]], [[human]] tinkerers, and an alchemist.
document_data.History: Around [[1370 DR]], Fizmorayen was known to purchase [[adamantite]] ore and resell it to merchants from [[Waterdeep]].
